title: Office Supplies are Key to Small Business Productivity
content:
Office Supplies are Key to Small Business Productivity  0 comments 

(StatePoint) In today’s recovering economy, small and medium-sized businesses (SMBs) know the importance of making the right investments to stay nimble and lean. Surpassing advertising and even salaries, SMBs say their top investment is office supplies, according to a recent survey conducted by Office Depot, Inc.   

There is a strong correlation between gear and feelings of productivity and control -- whether it’s SMBs’ favorite or most used, according to the survey. In fact, 60 percent say purchasing new office gear gives them a sense of accomplishment. 

Inspiration for office supplies that help SMBs stay organized and productive is available at www.officedepot.com. 

With smart investments, you can give your business the gear it needs to succeed.
